message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire a product that I believe will be of significant value to your business.  My research indicates this product is worth at least $1,500,000 to you. I'm willing to sell it for $1,250,000. This represents a substantial savings for you while still allowing me to achieve a very favorable outcome. Please consider this offer carefully.  I understand if it's not the right fit for you, but I'm confident it could be a mutually beneficial deal.
